symc.name: FindExInfoStandard
symc.desc: The FindFirstFileEx function retrieves a standard set of attribute information. The data is returned in a WIN32_FIND_DATA structure.

symc.name: FindExInfoBasic
symc.desc: The FindFirstFileEx function does not query the short file name, improving overall enumeration speed. The data is returned in a WIN32_FIND_DATA structure, and the cAlternateFileName member is always a NULL string. Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: This value is not supported until Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows 7.

symc.name: FindExInfoMaxInfoLevel
symc.desc: This value is used for validation. Supported values are less than this value.
